name: Exceptional driving school
short_description: Exceptional driving school provides driving lessons in Bolton, Bury, Radcliffe and surrounding areas.Learning to drive can be a life changing event, at the onset you can be anxious and excited at the same time. This is why our driving lessons are structured to each individual in order to provide an enjoyable, satisfying and rewarding learning experience. Your professional driving lessons are carried out by myself Dan Ison. I am an Advanced driver with 23 years experience. I am also a fully qualified Driving Standards Agency (DSA) approved driving instructor (ADI). Along with being a full member of the Driving Instructors Association (DIA).
summary: driving school providing driving lessons in Bolton, Bury & Radcliffe
